nodes.bodyText: should currency pair not be added into this as well?
Unfortunately the API does not provide currency pair here.
should currency pair not be added into this as well?
Unfortunately the API does not provide currency pair here.

Not necessary but a bit more elegant you can do something like
return Collections.singletonList(new MarketOrder(orderType,  
    entry.getOriginalAmount(),
    null,  
    Long.toString(entry.getId()),  
    new Date(entry.getTimestamp()),  
    entry.getAvgPrice(),  
    entry.getOriginalAmount().subtract(entry.getRemainingAmount()),  
    null,  
    orderStatus,  
    null));
